description: Manage budgets for an Azure subscription.

commands.name: az consumption budget create
commands.summary: Create a budget for an Azure subscription.
commands.syntax:
az consumption budget create --amount
                             --budget-name
                             --category {cost, usage}
                             --end-date
                             --start-date
                             --time-grain {annually, monthly, quarterly}
                             [--meter-filter]
                             [--resource-filter]
                             [--resource-group]
                             [--resource-group-filter]

commands.name: az consumption budget create-with-rg
commands.summary: Create operation to create or update a budget. Update operation requires latest eTag to be set in the request mandatorily. You may obtain the latest eTag by performing a get operation. Create operation does not require eTag.
commands.syntax:
az consumption budget create-with-rg [--amount]
                                     [--budget-name]
                                     [--category {Cost, Usage}]
                                     [--e-tag]
                                     [--filters]
                                     [--ids]
                                     [--notifications]
                                     [--resource-group]
                                     [--subscription]
                                     [--time-grain {Annually, Monthly, Quarterly}]
                                     [--time-period]

commands.name: az consumption budget delete
commands.summary: Delete a budget for an Azure subscription.

commands.name: az consumption budget delete-with-rg
commands.summary: Delete operation to delete a budget.

commands.name: az consumption budget list
commands.summary: List budgets for an Azure subscription.

commands.name: az consumption budget show
commands.summary: Show budget for an Azure subscription.

commands.name: az consumption budget show-with-rg
commands.summary: Get the budget for a resource group under a subscription by budget name.

commands.name: az consumption budget update
commands.summary: Update operation to create or update a budget. Update operation requires latest eTag to be set in the request mandatorily. You may obtain the latest eTag by performing a get operation. Create operation does not require eTag.
commands.syntax:
az consumption budget update [--add]
                             [--amount]
                             [--budget-name]
                             [--category {Cost, Usage}]
                             [--e-tag]
                             [--filters]
                             [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                             [--ids]
                             [--notifications]
                             [--remove]
                             [--set]
                             [--subscription]
                             [--time-grain {Annually, Monthly, Quarterly}]
                             [--time-period]

commands.name: az consumption budget update-with-rg
commands.summary: Update operation to create or update a budget. Update operation requires latest eTag to be set in the request mandatorily. You may obtain the latest eTag by performing a get operation. Create operation does not require eTag.
commands.syntax:
az consumption budget update-with-rg [--amount]
                                     [--budget-name]
                                     [--category {Cost, Usage}]
                                     [--e-tag]
                                     [--filters]
                                     [--ids]
                                     [--notifications]
                                     [--resource-group]
                                     [--subscription]
                                     [--time-grain {Annually, Monthly, Quarterly}]
                                     [--time-period]
